inn1.comm: starts with a delivery on a good length just outside off, Simmons plays from the crease towards mid-off
good length once again but the line is wider outside off, Simmons lets it go, the carry through to Parthiv is average
fuller length outside off and this time the bounce through to the keeper is low after Simmons strides forward and shoulders arms

first appeal of the day as Praveen strikes Simmons' pad with one that comes in, Simmons moved forward and a little across to defend, Praveen was extremely confident, the impact may have been just outside off, that could be the only reason for umpire Gould to give it not out, one inswinger after three that moved away
good length with movement away from the right-hander, Simmons lets it go
Simmons lets the final ball go as well, so Praveen begins with a maiden over
Ishant's first ball of the series is pitched short of a length, Hyatt gets caught on the crease and hit on the glove

Ishant pitches it short again, Hyatt lets it go, and the umpire's called it wide. That's an odd call, a rather harsh one. Was that wide on height? No, and it was definitely inside the tram line. The pitch is slow though
fuller ball and Hyatt pushes tentatively at it off the front foot, he gets beaten
Ishant gets the ball to rise on Hyatt from a good length, cramping him for room with the angle into the right-hander, Hyatt fends awkwardly at the ball and it lobs safely in front of square
short of a length once again, Simmons stays in his crease and dabs it behind square

Hyatt is gone, and he always looked like going. Ishant got the ball to rise again from a good length, Hyatt stayed in his crease and just fended at it. It hit the top half of the outside edge and lobbed tamely towards backward point. A duck on debut and 1 today, a minor improvement at least.
played off the back foot towards cover point
played off the front foot towards midwicket
good length ball on off and middle, Sarwan pushes towards the bowler
Praveen goes past the outside edge of Sarwan's forward push with some late away movement from a good length
Sarwan gets behind the line of a good length delivery and defends
short of a length with more movement away from the right-hander, the ball dies on its way through to Parthiv after Sarwan lets it go
Sarwan covered the movement nicely this time, moving across his crease, angling the bat to play the ball towards cover point. Praveen has completed his second maiden
Ishant over-steps as he delivers a short of a length ball that Simmons defends from his crease, he won't be defending the upcoming free hit though
the free-hit is a slower ball that's extremely wide outside off stump, he'll have to do that again
Ishant pitches it short and Simmons tries to pull, he gets a top edge that flies over the keeper's head, Rohit gives chase from slip. Ishant's getting some sharp bounce from this pitch.
there's that steep bounce from short of a length on a line just outside off, Simmons jumps up on the back foot to play the ball but then drops his wrists to let it pass
good length outside off Simmons moves back and across to defend on the off side

that's the first boundary of the day, Simmons backed away towards leg, Ishant followed him with a short of a length ball, Simmons managed to stay inside the line and pulled it to the backward square leg boundary
defended off the back foot towards the leg side
Simmons plays the square drive from the crease towards point
fuller length from Praveen, compared to Ishant's, Sarwan presses forward and opens the face to play towards point
Sarwan moves back and punches the ball towards extra cover
good length outside off, Sarwan shoulders arms
Praveen pitches on that driveable length just outside off and asks the batsman to go for it before seaming it away, Sarwan resists and shoulders arms

caught at point! A tame dismissal. The length was a little shorter and the line a little wider. It seamed away from Sarwan who moved back and cut it. He wasn't able to hit it in the gap or along the ground. Manoj Tiwary barely had to move to catch it.
Bravo lets his first ball go outside off, that's a hat-trick of maidens. A Zaheer-esque start for Praveen
played off the back foot towards cover point
Ishant pitches on a good length outside off and slants the ball away from Bravo, who thrusts his foot forward and lifts his bat out of the way
straighter line from Ishant and Bravo tucks it off his hips towards square leg
short of a length angling into Simmons, cramping him for room, the batsman takes one hand off the bat as he defends
Simmons was expecting this, he sat on the back foot, waiting for the short of a length ball, and heaved it over wide long-on for the innings' second boundary
that is classy! Simmons presses forward to a fuller ball that angles into him and swings freely across the line, lofting the ball over the midwicket boundary. There was smoothness in that shot
that's too wide outside off
left alone outside off stump by Bravo, who watches the ball slant across him
this time the bounce is poor to Parthiv, after Bravo lets it go again
he's let another one go outside of, Bravo is a patient starter today
finally the batsman scores a run off Praveen today, Bravo opens the face to guide the ball towards third man, had to reach out to play it though
Praveen strays on to the pads and Simmons flicks it towards long leg, the running between the wickets is quick
Simmons moves forward and drives a full ball through cover, he hasn't timed it all that well though
Ishant pitches the ball full outside off and slants it away from the left-hander from over the wicket, Bravo presses forward and lets it go
good length and the line is straighter, Bravo has to get behind it and block
Bravo pushes the ball towards point and sets off, Simmons sends him back, the fielder at point throws at the stumps at the batsman's end and misses, there's no back up and Bravo gets his single

there's a loud appeal for caught behind after Simmons misses a wild pull to a short ball, Ishant joined Parthiv's appeal rather late, or was he just celebrating right away? I didn't hear or see anything
defended from the crease towards the off
fuller ball angling into the right-hander, Simmons moves across and nudges behind square
Simmons jumps down the pitch and drives the ball towards midwicket
Simmons was struck on the pad as he tried to turn the ball on the leg side, that was missing leg by a long way. It kept low too
this time Simmons makes contact with the flick off the pads but hits it to the fielder at square leg
another one keeps low after pitching on a length, Simmons played back and had to crouch to defend
Simmons hoists the ball over midwicket even though it isn't that short from Praveen, he hasn't timed it perfectly and long-on cuts it off
Simmons makes cleaner contact this time and flicks the ball through midwicket for two more
good length and straight, Bravo moves forward and defends with a straight bat
Bravo plays a classy punch off the back foot with a flowing follow through but can't beat the infield at cover
Bravo tries to force the ball again off the back foot but bottom-edges it into the ground towards slip
Bravo took his eyes off that short ball as he swayed away, left his bat sticking up there as the ball passed over him
Bravo was cramped for room by that one that rose from short of a length, played it down on the off side
Bravo got into a bit of a tangle while trying to play that bouncer, began to play it and then ducked just in time, and it's been called wide for height! Ishant is not pleased.

did that hit the edge? Parthiv dived forward desperately to take the catch as it died on him and couldn't reach it before the ball hit grass. Bravo had pressed forward to a slower ball and was beaten by the change of pace. It did take the edge
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
played off the front foot towards midwicket
Bravo strides forward again and blocks
Bravo strides forward, gets to the pitch of the ball and smothers it, Ashwin is bang on target
defended on the front foot
Bravo steps out and lofts the ball straight over the bowler, he didn't make proper contact and the ball won't reach the boundary, just managed to clear the infield
good length outside off stump, Simmons moves forward and drives towards cover
played from the crease towards mid-off
fuller ball on off and middle, Simmons moves forward and drives on the leg side
Bravo strides forward and defends towards the bowler

close call for Simmons! Bravo played the ball towards mid-off and Simmons set off for the single. Bravo declined and Simmons had to turn back and he slipped as he did so. Mishra missed the stumps at the bowler's end as Simmons was scrambling and crawling to get back
Bravo makes room and clubs a length ball past mid-on for four, not the prettiest shot
Simmons nudges the ball towards square leg and sets off, Bravo says no
Simmons backs away towards leg, Ashwin follows him, Simmons defends towards the bowler
defended on the leg side
shorter ball on middle and leg, Simmons works the ball through square
Bravo reaches out for one around off and drags the ball across the line towards the midwicket boundary, again not the prettiest shot
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Mishra bowls a quicker and straight one, Simmons defends on the front foot
shot! Simmons jumps down the pitch, gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts it so cleanly over the long-on boundary
he's taking the fight to Mishra! Planting his foot forward and swinging across the line, carting the ball over deep midwicket where it's caught beyond the boundary
left alone outside off stump
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Simmons pushes off the front foot towards cover point and runs a quick single, he's entered the 40s, which is danger territory for him, he needs to press on today
Simmons nudges the ball from his crease off his pads through square
Bravo steps out of his crease and defends because he didn't get to the pitch of the ball
played towards short third man
Bravo steps out again and this time he's in position to drive towards long-on
Simmons gets hit on the pad as he tries to turn the ball towards square, that was missing leg
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Bravo defends on the front foot towards the off side
Bravo leans forward and turns the ball off his pads through the leg side
Bravo plays the ball towards point and runs, Simmons sends him back, Praveen swooped on the ball but his throw to Parthiv is poor, else Bravo was a goner
Bravo attempts to sweep but doesn't connect properly
Bravo steps out but once again defends after not getting to the pitch of the ball

caught at deep midwicket! Bravo steps out to Mishra once again, he isn't quite to the pitch but he goes through with the shot, lifting the ball off his pads towards the deep where Manoj Tiwary moves to his right and takes a well-judged catch on the move. Bravo gives it away again. The Umar Akmal of West Indies?
played off the front foot on the leg side
Samuels moves back and defends on the leg side
Samuels strides forward and defends on the off side
defended back to the bowler
Samuels defends and then loses his balance, he end up doing a split of sorts
defended on the front foot on the off side
defended on the off side, the dots are on the rise
Simmons moves forward and defends
Mishra delivers on off stump, Simmons pushes towards cover
played off the front foot towards midwicket, Rohit Sharma gets to it quickly
defended back to the bowler
Simmons moves back to defend on the off side, a maiden for Mishra
Samuels gets going by playing the ball towards midwicket
Simmons opens the face late to steer the ball past first slip, there's no third man so the batsmen run three before fielders return the ball
Samuels drives the ball off the front foot towards long-on
Ashwin delivered that into the blockhole, Simmons defends on the off side
played off the pads through square
pushed down the ground towards long-off
that has bounced on Samuels who went back to play the legbreak, the ball took the shoulder of the bat and flew over first slip
Simmons turns the ball off his pads to reach his fifty, he's played well, but he really needs to turn this into a large score. He gets here often and gets out
paddle swept behind square for one more
Samuels drives off the front foot towards cover
defended on the back foot towards the off side
Samuels pushes forward again and blocks
plays off the pads behind square
tossed up on off stump, driven towards long off for a single
driven off the back foot down the ground
played off the pads towards square leg
once again he plays off the pads to square leg
Simmons dabs the ball late towards third man
played out to midwikcet where YK Pathan fields
the line on this one is outside off and it is flighted a tad, drawing Samuels out to push at it
played back to the bowler off the front foot
goes back to one pitching on a length off a flatter trajectory but cannot work it away with any timing
staying back in the crease to one pitched further up, somehow manages to get bat on it to defend
yet another maiden for Mishra as he pushes a flatter ball towards midwicket
pushed towards point for one
width offered outside off and Samuels goes back and drives powerfully through cover, Badrinath makes an excellent diving save on the boundary
defended on the front foot
back late off the back foot towards backward point
Simmons plays an extremely late cut towards third man, he made room towards leg and then played the ball, Kohli gave chase, dived but couldn't prevent the ball from touching the rope
played off the back foot towards midwicket

he's been given lbw! Samuels thrust forward to a googly from Mishra, and didn't pick it. He was hit on the pad as he tried to defend and his edgy innings is over. Will need to see replays to confirm that was a good decision. Samuels had a good stride forward and was hit on the knee roll. Replays indicate the ball would have gone over the stumps
Pollard strides forward and defends on the of side
Pollard moves back and turns the ball off the pads behind square
Simmons goes back to cut but gets an edge that goes wide of slip towards third man
defended on the front foot
pushed off the front foot towards the off side
played off the front foot towards midwicket
played off the pads but down to fine leg this time
played off the front foot towards the off side
Pollard goes back and plays the ball towards the leg side
Pollard strides forward this time and blocks
that was the carrom ball and Pollard defended it off the back foot
played off the back foot towards midwicket
short ball outside off, Simmons moves back and slaps the ball through cover
he goes back this time and dabs towards short third man
Pollard survives! He played away from his body and drove, trying to hit the ball through the off side. He got a thick outside edge that flew in the air but wide of the fielder at short third man
defended on the front foot
Pollard has another idiotic swing at the ball, trying to hit it down the ground without getting to the pitch of the ball. It beats him for length and spins easily past the outside edge
defended on the front foot
pushed off the front foot towards point
Simmons stays in his crease and tries to work the ball off the pads, he doesn't make contact

oh Simmons what have you done! He was batting so well but he chose to run after pushing the ball on the leg side, Tiwary (who just can't stay out of the game!) swooped on the ball from square leg and hit the stumps at the bowler's end direct with a  flat throw. Simmons was well out, doesn't even need a replay
defended on the front foot towards the off
Pollard tries to let the ball go down leg but it clips his pad
Baugh strides forward and defends on the off side
Baugh drives towards cover
Baugh stays in his crease and drives through cover
defended back to the bowler
played off the back foot towards square leg for a single
cut off the back foot towards deep point
Baugh presses forward and nudges the ball off the pads towards square
played off the pads towards fine leg
Pollard forces the ball off his pads towards square leg
Yusuf strays down leg side
Pollard gets a bit of width and drives towards deep cover
quicker ball that hurries on to Baugh before he can play it, hits his thigh and his arm
played through cover for a single
Baugh gets beaten outside off stump
Tiwary tosses up a legbreak outside off, Baugh reaches out to swat it but mis-times it
defended on the front foot
Baugh tries to drive too hard through cover and once again mis-times the shot
bowled outside off stump once again, left alone by Baugh
this time he cuts towards Yusuf at deep point
nudged off the front foot towards backward point
played off the front foot towards midwicket
played off the front foot with soft hands for a single on the off side
Pollard moves back and across and nudges the ball towards fine leg
defended on the front foot
Baugh goes back and blocks once again
there's the Pollard we know! Hitting the ball with a straight bat right over the bowler's head, the ball crashes into the sight screen, got to the pitch and clobbered it
this time he hammers the ball in the air just to the left of Tiwary, who made no attempt to catch that rocket, the fielder at long-off had no chance
played off the back foot towards cover
bowled flatter and straighter, Pollard thrusts forward and blocks
Pollard wants a single after pushing towards point but Baugh sends him back
Pollard swings at the ball, wanting to hit it through the off side, but he gets an outside edge towards third man, the fielder in the circle has to give chase
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Pollard stays back and opens the face to steer the ball through the vacant slip cordon
driven back to the bowler who can't stop it cleanly, the ball goes off the body towards extra cover
Baugh defends on the front foot towards extra cover
played towards short fine leg for one
that's wide outside off, Pollard chases and tries to cut but misses
width offered outside off and Baugh cuts it towards third man
Ishant over-steps while delivering a good length ball outside off, Pollard lets it go, free-hit coming up, that's his second no-ball today
and once again Ishant follows up the no-ball with a wide, this time it's a wide for height, that bouncer flew over Pollard's head
full ball in the blockhole outside off, Pollard could only play the free-hit back to the bowler
Pollard tries to turn a short of a length ball through square but gets hit on the thigh
that ball is quicker and bounces more from a length, Pollard reached for it outside off and tried to run it to third man, he got beaten
pushed from the crease towards the leg side for a single
Baugh goes back and defends a short of a length ball on the pitch and responds to Pollard's call
Baugh drives towards the off, Yusuf scampers to his left to field
played off the pads towards backward square where Tiwary fields
Baugh tries to drive through cover without getting to the pitch and can't make proper contact
turned off the pads through short fine leg
punched off the back foot towards midwicket
driven off the back foot to long-on for a single
Pollard tries to close the face to one angling into him on off stump but gets a leading edge through cover
Pollard steps down and works the ball off his hips towards long leg
Baugh goes back and plays a whippy flick through midwicket
Ishant tests Pollard with a bouncer and the batsman ducks under it
Pollard steps down again, Ishant shortens the length and Pollard has to defend towards cover
83.4 mph from Ishant, hits Pollard on the thigh as he steps out and tries to work the ball through the leg side
Baugh moves forward and pushes the ball with soft hands in front of point, the fielder doesn't pick it up cleanly
Pollard gets cramped for room by the googly as he tries to play off the back foot, plays it through square leg
Baugh nudges it through midwicket for a single
played off the pads to midwicket
slightly shorter from Mishra, Pollard punches off the back foot to cover
Pollard tries to turn the ball off the pads but can't make contact
good length outside off stump, defended towards point
played towards cover this time off the front foot, excellent line and length from Praveen
Baugh plays an ugly swipe across the line to one that pitches outside off and moves away a touch, misses it completely
shot! Baugh steps down the pitch, waits for the short ball to reach him and pulls it in front of midwicket for four, Badrinath dives on the boundary in vain
Praveen responds with a slower bouncer that beats Baugh, who tries to hook it
pushed off the front foot towards point
Pollard moves back and cuts the ball to cover point
Pollard stays back and drives hard towards the bowler
Pollard drives the ball off the front foot towards cow corner, Ishant runs to his right from long-on and fields
he's drilled this hard down the ground and Ishant has no chance, it was the flatter ball and Pollard used it to bring up the 50 partnership
defended on the front foot
Pollard goes back to slap the shorter ball through cover
Pollard forces the ball from outside off stump towards square leg
Baugh gets on to the front foot and plays to backward point, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but Baugh is home, he took it easy towards the end
Pollard stays in his crease and biffs the ball past the bowler towards long-on
defended back to the bowler
full ball on the pads, Pollard stays in his crease and drives the ball through midwicket, he's picked out the gap in the deep too
dabbed towards midwicket for a single, Pollard keeps strike
a touch short and Pollard pulls towards deep midwicket where Tiwary fumbles and allows a second
pushed towards long on for a single
Baugh goes back and dabs the ball with an open face towards backward point
bowled full on middle and leg, Pollard pushes to midwicket
a carrom ball and Pollard dabs it towards the leg side to bring up his half-century. He's faced plenty of criticism and has responded with a valuable innings. Well played.
punched off the back foot towards the off side
good length but on middle and leg, Pollard works the ball off his pads through square
Baugh moves back and across to nudge the ball towards long leg
Pollard comes down to try and smash the ball through midwicket but misses and gets hit on the pad
Baugh swipes across the line and slogs the ball to long-on
flicked off the pads to short fine leg
full toss on middle stump, a low one, Pollard gets under it and clips it in the air over the in field and into the gap on the midwicket boundary, didn't try to hit it too hard
nudged towards point for a single
Pollard tries to hammer the ball through cover but gets an outside edge towards third man
punched off the back foot to deep cover
Baugh lofts the ball in the air over midwicket but it falls short of deep midwicket
defended on the back foot on the off side
Pollard moves back and drives towards long off
that's a wide down leg side
ok that was so short that even I might have got bat on that, Pollard had an age to wait on the back foot and pull it effortlessly over deep square leg
played off the pads towards square leg
Pollard's in his element now, picks one off his pads and flicks it past short fine leg for four. This innings has been a long time coming, but finally, it's here
defended back to the bowler
Pollard lunges forward for one and chips it in the air towards long on
defended on the front foot towards the off side and Baugh scampers through for a single, Pollard doesn't know how to scamper, he takes Giant Gonzales sized strides
Baugh backs away towards leg to make room, Ashwin follows him but Baugh still has enough space to carve the ball from outside leg stump past point

huge blow for West Indies! Pollard has been caught at long-off. He backed away towards leg to hit through the off, Ashwin bowled a full ball outside leg, denying him room, and Pollard lofted it straight to the fielder on the boundary
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
shot! Russel has some width to free his arms and the length is full, he simply lines it up and lofts the bowler back over his head
swept towards deep backward square leg
defended back to the bowler
Baugh pulls the ball through midwicket
that's not that short from Ishant but Russel tries to pull, the result is a top edge that flies over Parthiv's leaping body for four
Russel tries to drive from the crease through the off side this time, the ball flies off the edge towards third man
the slower ball bowled short of a length, Baugh swings and is beaten
short and wide from Ishant, a real hit-me-please ball, and Baugh did just that, freeing his arms and cutting it behind point and wide of third man
Short and wide again from Ishant, Baugh cuts again, this time in front of backward point for the same result
smashed! Russell went back to a short ball and just hammered it right back at Mishra's head, he put his hands up for a moment but then wisely ducked out of the way
this time he gets beaten
defended on the front foot
Terrific hit! Russel makes a bit of room, gets under the ball and lofts it powerfully over wide mid-off, cleared the boundary by yards and yards
Russell aims for the leg side this time but mis-hits it, his swing is so powerful though that he slices it over extra cover
Baugh tries to hit through the leg side but gets hit on the body
Baugh is hurried by Ishant's pace as he tries to work the ball on the leg side, think he got some glove on that before it hit his body
full ball outside off stump, just inside the tram line, Russell was backing away towards leg and hence looked as though the ball was far away from him. Poor call from the umpire
Russell tries to hit the ball straight and out of the ground with a mighty heave but misses
low full toss outside off and Russell slices it towards deep point
Baugh backs away to make room and drives the ball towards cover
a slower ball but it's down leg side, it would have been wide but Ishant had over-stepped again so it's a no-ball with a free-hit coming up, his third offence of the day
Baugh swipes at the free-hit and manages to clear mid off, that ball rose on Baugh and made it hard for him to hit cleanly
Baugh moves towards the off, trying to lift the ball over short fine leg, he misses and is hit on the body, might have been some bat there somewhere
Baugh needs to give the strike to Russell here, he tries to drive hard through the off side but gets beaten
caught at long-on, Baugh charged Praveen and pulled the shorter and slower ball straight to Kohli on the boundary

caught at long-on again! Russell stood in his crease and also swiped at a length ball that was a touch slower. The bat turned in his hand but the ball still carried towards Kohli who took the catch while running to his left
pushed on the off side for a single
full and straight, played on the leg side for one more
in the blockhole from Praveen, Sammy plays it back to the bowler who picks it up on his follow through, he's completed a splendid spell
Ishant goes past Roach with a speedy short of a length delivery
Roach deftly opens the face off the back foot to play the ball towards third man
Full ball just outside off stump, Roach drives to straight to cover

Roach doesn't know where he is for a moment, Ishant's short ball crashed into his helmet as he tried to hook, looked a bit dazed for a few seconds, he takes off his helmet and he's bleeding near the mouth

oh yes, Ishant digs it in, Roach moves back and across and fends awkwardly, he then sets off for the single. Ishant fields the ball on his follow through and then turns to throw the stumps down at the bowler's end. Roach is a few inches short but I didn't hear any strong appeals. Umpire Malcolm doesn't refer it as a result. Surely someone appealed? Harbhajan Singh signals frantically from the dressing room saying it's out but it's too late ..the game moves on ...
Sammy tries to play the glance but can't make contact, the ball hits his pad though and goes to fine leg for four

inn2.comm: starts off with a pacy full toss around off which is worked away for a single wide of midwicket
faces his first ball a touch tentatively, it is a length ball and he shuffles to push it down the track
slightly shorter than the previous one, allows him to stay on the back foot and defend solidly on the off side
gets a sighter on this one, a ball that bounces a tad but outside off and he immediately shoulders arms
thick outside edge gets Tiwary his first run, he goes back to push at a ball angled in and gets it down to third man
no short delivery yet from Roach, Parthiv blocks a length ball down the pitch
defended off the back foot, Sammy with some bounce, slip gets around to field
now some movement to accompany the bounce, angles in on a length outside off and zips away, batsman lets it go wisely
shortish and wide at around 75 mph, not on, comes up slowly, but Tiwary does not attack it, is content to glide it past point for a single
the earlier one was short and wide, this one is full and on the pads of Parthiv, he likes it there, wristily whips it with a flourish past short fine leg for the first boundary of the innings

this would have been another one but Russell went sprinting after it at full tilt, the dive came in just near the wide long on rope and two runs are saved, Parthiv's pleasing flick will have to do with a couple
not a drive, not a push, somewhere in between as PArthiv checks the shot to get a single to the right of mid off
cautiously pushes a length ball around middle and leg towards midwicket
88.3 mph and short of a length, the pace and bounce hurries Parthiv in to missing the attempted nudge off the pads, and the ball rolls away in the air on the off side
this one comes a touch slowly now off the pitch and he mistimes as he looks to force in through extra cover

in the air, but there is no one around backward of square leg and Parthiv's wrists are getting him some runs early on as he whips a back of a length ball of the hip, some footwork in the deep saves one
well bowled, took him by surprise the short one, took off outside off stump, he went on his toes to bring it down
a bit further up this one, but still back of a length and he blocks it away on the off side
Sammy beats PArthiv with one that decides to take off from just back of a length, he rolled his fingers on the side of the ball and it zipped past Parthiv's outside edge
beaten again, this time by the bounce as he tries to force a cut off the back foot
walks down the pitch and squeezes one towards point where Pollard's huge frame dives but over the ball and then recovers quickly to chase it
punched off the back foot but no power in the shot, extra cover fields
dismissed! Parthiv gets on top of the short ball, waits in the crease, arches back and pulls it high over midwicket
and Parthiv is beaten by the change in angle as one goes straight on wide outside off, he chases it attempting a booming drive but cannot connect

Tiwary survives, he got an inside edge backward of square leg and took off, Parthiv did not make any attempt to, Simmons fired in the throw as Tiwary turned back belatedly, if there would have been a direct hit he was gone
close to off stump on a length and Tiwary decides to leave it alone
now Tiwary is beaten outside off as he looks to drive from the crease, some bounce on that one
reins himself in, does not go after this one, stays in the crease and guides it to gully
again he does not go hard at this one, there was lots of width on offer, but he tamely pushes out to point

Tiwary is nervous and it is showing in these pokes, as he gets the outside edge to one that was pitched up a touch fuller, but the simplest of chances is grassed by Darren Bravo at slip, it goes slowly to him, grazes his palms and pops out, jeez that was a dolly really
now Parthiv gets away, he wanted to play another of those whips off the pad, but ended up spooning it in the air, falls short of the man in front of square leg
now he can't connect with the flick to one there outside leg stump, but picks up a run as leg gully gets around to it
Tiwary is batting as if he were on a minefield, goes back and tentatively defends a length ball on the off side

it is over for Manoj Tiwary, he has looked very nervous out there, and another of those prods has done him in, Sammy pitched it up, close to off stump, leaving the batsmen who pushed at it with an open face and the edge was gobbled up by Baugh, Bravo looks relieved
whoa, Virat looks to casually leave one outside off but gets it off the outer half of the blade to pick up a single to third man
some width on offer and PArthiv uses it to dab it away to third man
there is that forcing cut from PArthiv, short and wide, he gets on a leg and gives it everything, the ball flies over point and Russell is not far from it at third man but it beats his dive
tighter line, pushed away on the off side
calmly pushes one around middle and leg towards mid on
Martin saves a single now at square leg, dives to his right to stop a flick from PArthiv
90.9 mph from Roach and near the blockhole, Parthiv digs it out somehow
another of those whips off the pads, this one was in Gilchrist-fashion, shuffling and whipping it with fast hands, flies in the air but falls short of long leg
seemed to stop in the air as he pushed forward and stabbed at a length ball, falls well short of Sammy
can't get it away, tries to force it down the ground but straight to mid off
and first ball beats him as Parhiv tries to slash and misses, it bounces and is too much for Baugh
tries to flick it away through midwicket but misses, takes it on the pads
gets the single this time as he clips one off his toes in front of square
guides it past point for a single off the back foot
pushed back down the track
pushes forward to a fuller one and gets the single in front of point
Parthiv continues to prosper off his pads, waits for it to come on and clips it past mid on
off the pad but they will pick up the run as Parthiv shuffles to one that then rolls towards square leg
shuffles to one from back of a length that Roach angles in to the body, but can't get it past square leg
goes forward but does not go for the drive, waits for a length ball to come on and pushes it in the gap between cover and point
gets across to one angled in on the pads and clips it with neat timing in front of square leg and gets three by the time it is pulled back

Parthiv has fallen within jim's range, tried to drive on the up but seemed to check the followthrough in the end, the ball went low to Sammy's left and the captain does extremely well to get a hand down and manage to hold on, holds up the ball for effect too
off the mark right away as he walks across to a back of a length ball and gets it backward of square leg
again Virat gets forward and does not drive  but pushes it firmly, well done too, there is a man waiting for the uppish drive at short cover
consistently getting well forward, to the line of the ball and meeting it with a push
stays back now to one that is a touch slower and plonks it away on the off side
shuffles across to one angled in from back of a length and keeps it down comfortably
wants to have a poke at one way outside off stump, but withdraws his bat at the last moment
some confusion as Badri forces it off the back foot and both batsmen set off, Pollard gets to it at point and has them rushing back
banged in short but there is not much in this pitch, Badri gets behind it easily and is able to defend
boundary for Badri but off a thick edge, bowled fuller for the drive and BAdri goes for the bait, but the ball scoots past the waiting slips and in to the third man boundary
no luck for Roach, Badri decides to force a length ball from the crease and is beaten totally as he is nowhere close to it
now Virat drives, but again he restrains himself and does not go hard at it, extra cover fields
pushed away off the back foot towards mid on
comes forward and bends the knee to flow in to a pleasing drive, with out any power, to extra cover off a fuller one
stays beside the line of one close to off and looks to guide it for a single but gets it to point
for once Sammy goes on the pads with the angle and he picks him backward of square leg
Virat is beginning to get aggressive on the drive, that whiplash version that he plays, but cannot beat extra cover
runs in and bowls it on a length, defended down the track

what happened here? there is a lot of deviation on the ball after it passes Virat's forcing punch from the crease, but it had started jagging back in after pitching outside off, Virat tried to go after it as it came in but missed, Baugh took it low and they thought there was an edge, wasn't any though
pushed away from the crease but cannot get the run
played out on the leg side towards square leg for a single
almost chopped it on, hopped to play a shortish one outside off, and it trickled close to the stumps off an inside edge
has him hopping again, but there is no short leg in place, as he gets another inside edge that is in the air for some time
walks down the track and looks to slam it over covers, thick edge takes it down to third man
they take on mid on for the single, it is Hyatt who is a bit slow in getting to the ball and Sammy does not like that effort
the Virat whip-drive through extra cover, who dives to his right to stop the ball that wasn't timed well enough
front foot defence now from Virat, seems to be in no hurry
again they take on Hyatt with the single, this one was pushed wider of him, he runs to his right and fumbles the pick-up
gets to the pitch of a fuller one to ping sweeper cover with the drive on a knee

is that out? West Indies are sure, Badri had made some room to go over extra cover but Russell followed him with a nasty short one that reared up at Badri, who dropped the wrists and pulled his head out of the way, Windies think there is some glove on its way to Baugh, Sammy cannot believe it as umpire Malcolm takes a lot of time before shaking his head, he raised his left hand initially before putting it down, hmm
defended off the back foot as he gets behind the line of a length ball
pushed away close to the wicket, cannot get it away
Badri is going hard at this one, the pressure is on, there for the drive and Badri bends the knee and has a swing, beaten completely
Badri is in trouble again, but gets away to the other end this time, short ball and he goes for the awkward pull, getting too much outside the line, but it falls short of long leg
played out calmly in to the off side to end a testing over
stays in the crease and plays it out on the off side, Sammy fields
opens the face to glide it towards point but cannot get the single
Badri is putting a lot of pressure on him with these dots, tries to walk forward and work the single past point but cannot beat the man
so now he has to resort to some innovation to get off strike, bends the knee to paddle a length ball from outside off towards long leg
Badri in trouble once again, he hasn't looked so unsettled in a long time, goes for the drive and gets the outside edge which flies to third man past wide slip
top stuff from Virat, he is looking in control, whip-flick off the pads, did not looked to be timed so well as it purred past mid on but got so far from him quickly that he gave up the chase
targets him with the short ball again, he arches back to slash it towards third man but misses by a long way
that will help, Russell bowls one fuller for the drive and Badri obliges with a well-timed drive that flies straight to mid on

that is the end of Badrinath;s struggle, the short ball has consumed him, Russell has been bending his back to get the short one to climb up, this one was angled down leg, Badri got too far outside the line again and wen for a half-hearted pull, and only ended up gloving it towards Baugh who took a superb one-handed catch
misses the flick as he shuffles across, takes it on the pads, smiles as Russell stares at him
tries to angle in the short ball but gets it wrong way down leg
plays out a length ball calmly to mid on
gets forward for a languid drive along the ground past covers for a single
pushes forward at a length ball wide of mid off for a single
drops it in front of point for a quick single and makes it in the end
fuller one there for the drive and he does so wide of sweeper cover
just over backward point this time, India living dangerously at the moment, slashed hard at a widish one but it just carried over the fielder
drives with out going hard at the ball and gets it wide of sweeper cover
that is a Misbahesque bent-knee slog from way outside off stump by rohit and fortunately he gets it along the ground through midwicket
gets on top of the short ball, but does not get too much across like Badri did, and is able to keep the pull along the ground in front of square leg
another short one but it does not get up much, Virat forcefully pulls it in front of square for another single
this one rises from back of a length, so he checks the cut shot and instead guides it past point to third man
there is a man at a gully position now and he cuts off the attempt to open the face and pick up an easy single towards third man
goes across to turn a length ball with the angle backward of square leg
lovely drive from Rohit, gets forward, and bends the knee to ease the ball wide of sweeper cover
slightly short from the big man, tries to turn it square off the back foot, struck high on the pads
bowled shortish outside off, run down to third man for a single
another single down to third man, shortish on the off and he opens the face
shortish on the off, bends down and chops it down towards point
good length on the off, gets across and turns it wide of the bowler in the vacant midwicket region for a quick single
full outside off and Kohli chases that big time, can't connect however, not called a wide
angling it towards middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
bowled it full on the off, drives it towards long-on for a single
pushing it on a good length on the off, played away safely into the off side
drives it down the ground to long-off for a single
shortish on middle, punches it down to long-on for a single

stumped, was bowled flat and a little wider, Kohli made room to drive it through the off side, it turns away and misses the bat, Baugh collects well and takes off the bails in no time, good work with the gloves, Kohli has to go, his foot was in the air, big wicket
lunges forward to push a length ball towards covers
goes forward again, to the pitch of one a touch fuller but cannot get it past extra cover
that will help India a bit, pitched short and he latches on quickly, goes back and pulls it way over deep midwicket and on to the grass banks
neat drive this time, along the ground to sweeper cover off a length ball
tries to drive down the ground past the bowler but Pollard manages to get a hand to it and takes all the pace off it
played away to point with an open face, surprised him as it bounced extra around off
tossed up full around leg and he pushes it down the track
has him reaching out to one around off but the drive goes past a diving extra cover
defended solidly off the front foot down the track
Martin does a lot of work to his left to stop the single off a push
played away in to the off side but without any chance of a run
this time he gets the single, goes down on a knee even as he pulls away a shortish ball to deep midwicket
shuffles and works a length ball from middle stump in front of square leg
looks to cut a wide delivery without moving the feet, reaches out awkwardly and is beaten

this is superb stuff from Carlton Baugh, it was a fuller delivery angled in down the leg side, Rohit got out of the crease with the momentum as he missed the fine flick, but Baugh had moved to his left following the line of the ball, collected it and had the bails off in an instant, replays show the foot came back just in time, the closest of shaves for Rohit
comes forward now and calmly flows in to a drive towards long off for the single
ends up on leg stump from short of a length, and Raina manages to get something on it with his habit of walking way outside the line to anything marginally short
shows the full face of a straight blade to drive a fuller one down the track
works it away off the pads to deep square leg to keep the strike
gets nicely forward to a full and flat ball and pings long off with the drive
allows another flat ball to come on, does not turn much and he guides it towards point
picked off the pads through square leg for a single
lunges out and drives with a big followthrough down to long off
pushed back to the bowler who fields in his followthrough
quicker one but on the pads and he happily nudges it in front of square
gets behind the line to drive a length ball but Pollard fields in his followthrough
comes slowly off the track and he goes back to plonk it down on the wicket
another single as he shuffles to work it backward of square leg
gets around this one on off stump and turns it with a closed face of the blade to long on
fuller ball outside off and Raina nicely drives it along the ground off the front foot to long off
stands tall to a back of a length ball and whips it past the bowler, between the stumps and Raina
tossed up on leg stump and pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
Rohit goes in the air, but well wide of long on, got forward to a tossed up ball and whipped it against the turn, dangerous shot but he hit it in the gap
nudged away towards square leg from the crease
now he lofts over extra cover with the turn, flighted around off and he drives in the air through the line, Samuels has lot of work to do on the wide long off boundary
driven down to long off for another single

Suresh Raina falls to the slog sweep, it was there for the shot, full around middle, he decided to go for it but hit it straight to midwicket who timed the leap to take the catch, Martin is pumped up, jumps in the air as his team mates rush to him
full delivery at medium pace outside off and he is driven to sweeper cover
length ball outside off which he looks to cut forcingly but does not time it, picks up a single in front of point
Rohit gets another single, he is looking really good

it was Raina in the previous game, it is YK Pathan in this one, a shot that is not on at all, long off in place and he decides to go over his head off his second delivery, does not time it at all, and just shoves it in the air to long off who comes in to accept the gift, utterly senseless shot selection
steers it off the back foot towards short third man
played out from the crease on to the leg side
full ball around leg stump and he forces it down to long on
almost carried to the bowler, flat ball and he tries to work it towards midwicket, gets a leading edge towards the bowler who dives to his right to field
succeeds this time as he works it down to long on
and he can;t get the single as he works one away straight to Sammy
shorter and sliding on to the pads, worked away through square for a couple
gets forward to defend a delivery around off stump line
worked away off the pads through square leg
pushed away off the front foot towards extra cover
beaten as he initially looks to get forward and drive but finds it it too close and climbing, then tries to steers it away but cannot connect
hurried for pace but he manages to get bat in front of pad to get a length ball through point
loose drive from Ashwin outside off, a bit of a waft actually and he is beaten completely
digs out a very full ball and squeezes it past point
gets bat around pad to push a flatter ball to long on
Martin has been diving around off his own bowling, and goes leaping to his left to parry a drive to extra cover
beaten in the flight, he lunged forward and just went ahead with the shot to loft it awkwardly over the bowler
nicely done by ashwin, he gets forward and pushes for a single towards cover

Rohit undoes all the good work with his version of the slog sweep, ball turns away from around leg, bounces a bit, and the resulting top edge swirls in the air, Darren Bravo is under it, and he manages t hold on, Martin is smiling widely
played out cautiously off the back foot into the off side
Roach lets the attempted yorker rip but it ends up as a full toss and is played away towards midwicket
now the short of a length ball, pegs him back and he stabs it away
goes for a forcing punch as he spots a bit if width, extra cover is there in the way
a touch straight this one and is worked away through midwicket
confident forward movement and meets the ball with a firm push to pick the single in front of covers
fired in full on leg stump and worked away to deep square leg
reacts late to a full one heading for leg stump but gets bat on it to send it rolling towards square leg
flat ball outside off, he comes forward and pushes to short extra cover
Baugh has taken a liking for the bails, batsman missed an attempted big drive and he had the bails off in a flash, he was in this time though
deft touches from Ashwin, remains in the crease and at the last moment dabs it from close to off stump and runs it fine on the off side
PK looks to clobber it out of sight, but will only get a single to long on
digs out a full ball that was the attempted yorker, was that a chance, looked like as PK checked the shot and the ball flew past Russell after grazing his hand
bit of confusion, Ashwin is having a chat with PK about it but a fumble by Sammy allowed them to get away
length ball played out back down the track
guided wide of backward point and PK makes it in time for the single
how did he survive that one, the slower ball, PK had made room to murder it over the bowler, but got nothing on it and the ball somehow managed to miss the stumps, bounced just over them
low full toss and it is creamed down to long off
PK gets away again, threw his bat a full ball but it fell well short of long off
beats him outside off with one bowled slower through the air and he has a poke at it
played out towards square leg
flatter one on the pads but he picks out square leg again
takes it on the pads as he fires it in on leg stump
paddled from close to off stump in the air backward of square leg
that is another one, another gift, this time from PK, backed away a touch to a short of a length ball, and just parried it limply to point
gets front foot out and works one coming in on the leg side for a run
gets across to nudge it away in front of square leg
blocked down the track, some extra bounce on it has him defending awkwardly
tries to force it away off the back foot but hits it in to the ground outside off
slower one around good length and it is pushed away towards extra cover
down the track comes Ashwin, gets to the pitch and picks up a single to long off
he is itching to give the charge, but plays it along the ground towards the non-striker
flatter one outside off and defended off the front foot
paddled away right from middle stump fine down the leg side
punched off the back foot towards extra cover
yorker length ball outside off and it is squeezed away towards point
makes room outside leg and the bowler goes wide outside off, so the batsman has to stretch to get to the ball, he does not manage to fully do so and gets it off the toe end of the bat
direct hit and Mishra was gone, he was slow in taking off for the single as Ashwin hit it to roach at mid off
slow full toss, Mishra adjusts to work it though midwicket

it is the early season of gifting and Ashwin carries on with it, length ball way outside off stump, he walks and stands far from the stumps, tries to scoop it over short fine leg without bending to get the distance, and ends up spooning a simple catch to that man
first delivery is comfortably outside off and he lets it go
defended off the front on the off side, MArtin runs to field
played back to the bowler this time
charges out, takes the high full toss and swings it to cover
clipped off the pad towards deep midwicket
tossed up full ball that is driven to extra cover

Baugh continues to break the stumps in a jiffy, was Ishant;s foot back in time as he missed this one outside off and overbalanced while trying to loft with the turn, replays show that it is very tight, well he has been given, Ishant looks surprised, at least he does not have to face Roach
